body.name: Delma Full Length Wall Mirror Tiles,Glassless Mirror for Kids,Acrylic-12''x12''x4PCS,Unbreakable Frameless Mirror Wall Stickers,Home Gym Mirror for Bedroom,Living Room,Door (11.8'' x 11.8'' - 4PCS)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, March 1 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Safer than glass mirrors -- These wall mirror tiles are made of Acrylic,they never cut the skin like glass,so they can be mounted to anywhere kids reach.
Better reflections -- The thickness of wall mirrors is 1.7mm ( 0.07inches ), better reflective effect than other similar mirror stickers（mostly they are in 1mm).
Easy to install -- Come with double-sided stickers,easy to stick,and never damage the wall.
Wall mirror sheets accurate size: 11.8'' x 11.8'', Total 4 pieces. These self adhesive mirrors could decorate bathroom, home gym, bedroom, which can be mounted on wall,tiles,closets,doors.
We provide various sizes of mirror sheets, please select the correct size before buying. And please clean your wall before installation, make sure the surface is flat, dry, without any powder.

ATTENTION: Acrylic mirrors' advantage is unbreakable, the reflection is not as excellent as glass mirrors, so they are especially suitable for kids and decoration, not suitable for large areas as a gym mirror. We also provide HD glass mirrors, you can choose them.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Better reflections Thickness of wall mirrors is ( 0.07inches ), better reflective effect than other similar mirror stickers. Easy to Install Mirror tiles come with double-sided stickers,easy to stick,and never damage the wall. With Protective Film Mirrors with a protective film, protect the mirror surface from damage or scratches during transportation.

Installation: 1.Put the sticker dots on the back of mirror,then stick the mirror onto the wall. 2.After all the mirrors are finished on the wall,peel off the front protective film. Attention: 1.The sticker dots can be used on any surface such like door,glass,tiles,wall,closets, but make sure it is smooth ,flat & dry. 2. Please confirm the size and quantity, select the correct ones before buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Transformative and Versatile Mirror Stickers
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Delma Mirror Stickers, and I am thoroughly impressed by their quality and versatility. These mirror tiles have completely transformed the space in my home.The self-adhesive feature on these mirror sheets makes them incredibly easy to install. I was pleasantly surprised by how effortlessly they adhered to the walls, and they've stayed put since installation. This feature eliminates the need for any additional tools, making the process smooth and hassle-free.What impressed me most about these mirror stickers is their clarity. Despite being acrylic, they provide a sharp, clear reflection, comparable to traditional glass mirrors. Additionally, their lightweight nature adds to the convenience and safety of use, especially in a household with children.The option to customize the arrangement of these mirror tiles allowed me to unleash my creativity. Whether it was creating a full-length mirror or a decorative wall pattern, the flexibility of these stickers catered perfectly to my needs.The product was delivered on time and in perfect condition. The packaging was secure, ensuring that the mirror sheets arrived without any scratches or damage.All in all, the Delma Mirror Stickers are a fantastic, innovative solution for anyone looking to enhance their interior decor with minimal effort. Their ease of installation, superior quality, and versatile design make them an absolute must-have. I would highly recommend this product for anyone in need of a convenient, stylish mirror solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to apply, safe for kids
reviews.reviewText: Easy to stick to a wall for my child to use, love that they are durable and shatterproof so I know he is safe around them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice for my room
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these. They’re easy to install and looks neat in my room. Great for decoration or for make up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mirrors, need better adhesive
reviews.reviewText: These mirrors are perfect and durable. The double sided tape didn't work that great for applying the mirrors to the board I wanted them on so they could be mobile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly accurate reflection; Safe and Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: I used the mirrors for our camper as they are plastic, highly reflective and easy to use without worrying about breakage traveling down the road. NOTE: I added my OWN border tape!To do that, I laid three pieces face down on a flat surface, taped the back together joining the three pieces, then used MY tape (not included) to add a border. Then they were easily mounted to the trailer cabinet doors with the two-sided sticker pads. With the extra two pieces (I bought an 8 pack), I bordered those with my tape and mounted to either side of our slide that does not have side windows, to bring more light in.Note, I held up a cup in different places so you could see the reflection and also included a picture of the cup where the two pieces of glass came together. No distortion!Also, as I couldn't find the sticky tape on my first look in the package, I contacted customer support and they responded quickly and were very accommodating. Highly recommend purchasing from this company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Enclosed stickers will damage the wall.
reviews.reviewText: The mirror itself is great. The stickers to use on the wall are not great. They damaged my wall, so I used command strips to hang the mirrors. Worked perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My tom turkey likes these
reviews.reviewText: These were just as described and were put up to keep my male turkey company. It worked but he tries to pick fights with himself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars HECK NO (unless you use ONE, and never clean it)
reviews.reviewText: Only useful if you want to use one, and I'd give a star or two more for that if the advertising didn't show them functioning the way I wanted them to. They do NOT create an image as shown when placed together due to slight warping of each. You'll just be totally disjointed. As one standalone mirror, it's fine. You'll never get it off your wall though.I found the adhesive is insane. These totally damaged my walls despite my care in trying to remove them various ways.And to try to return them, I couldn't get the adhesive off the back of half of the mirrors either. If you manage to get enough fingernail under it, pull it very very very slowly (a ton of trialling in other ways: floss, alcohol, goo gone) you might be able to remove it in nearly once piece. Hours later, just so over it!I was dumb and tried to make the mirror before evaluating a couple pieces. Therefore, I salvaged 8 of these enough to return, the other 8 totally damaged in trying to clean/remove them.These were scratched by a sponge while trying to wipe them clean of fingerprints, even just a dusting.Just buy the mirror, unless it's a safety thing. Your time and frustration is worth the money for a decent mirror experience. Amazon has all kinds of great deals on bigger real mirrors.

1. Build quality isn't good. Looks like hand made.2. Needs a flat surface. The mirror is very flexible. If you are sticking it on tiles and your tiles has bumps, the reflection looks like you applied distortion filter.
Image is not clear. Very flimsy and break easily.Waste of money. One pcs received with crack.

Horrible quality. The mirrors are distorted. Do not buy. Repeat do not waste your money. You won’t be able to use the mirrors at all!I bought 4 packs, but got only 1! And there is no way to contact the seller. All you are reduced to is putting a review. The mirrors are not useable what you buy these for. The water is not correct.
My head was normal before this mirror arrived. Now I have severe body issues n need therapy.
